metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38478 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Members the Mozilla Fuzzing Team reported memory safety bugs present inFirefox 103, Firefox ESR 102.1, and Firefox ESR 91.12. Some of these bugsshowed evidence of memory corruption and we presume that with enough effortsome of these could have been exploited to run arbitrary code. Thisvulnerability affects Thunderbird < 102.2, Thunderbird < 91.13, Firefox ESR< 91.13, Firefox ESR < 102.2, and Firefox < 104.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
